title: The other Iranian threat: cyberwarfare
description:
How much should we worry about Iranian hackers? 

Featuring:
Wired's Andy Greenberg: @a_greenberg

Links to resources discussed:
How Iran's Hackers Might Strike Back After Soleimani's Assassination
 
The US is worried about Iran retaliating with a cyberattack

The secret history of the Stuxnet | Recode Media | Alex Gibney

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:

Twitter: @Recode
